text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy ⚠️⚠️⚠️The Office of the Director of National Intelligence said US intelligence agencies had concurred that COVID-19 “was not man-made or genetically modified” by Chinese scientists in a government biological weapons laboratory from which it then escaped
